00016 #define B3_CL_MAX_ARG_SIZE 16
00017 B3_ATTRIBUTE_ALIGNED16(struct) b3KernelArgData
00018 {
00019     int m_isBuffer;
00020     int m_argIndex;
00021     int m_argSizeInBytes;
00022         int m_unusedPadding;
00023     union
00024     {
00025         cl_mem m_clBuffer;
00026         unsigned char m_argData[B3_CL_MAX_ARG_SIZE];
00027     };

00078         template<typename T>
00079                 inline void setConst( const T& consts )
00080                 {
00081                         int sz=sizeof(T);
00082                         b3Assert(sz<=B3_CL_MAX_ARG_SIZE);
00083 
00084                         if (m_enableSerialization)
00085                         {
00086                                 b3KernelArgData kernelArg;
00087                                 kernelArg.m_argIndex = m_idx;
00088                                 kernelArg.m_isBuffer = 0;
00089                                 T* destArg = (T*)kernelArg.m_argData;
00090                                 *destArg = consts;
00091                                 kernelArg.m_argSizeInBytes = sizeof(T);
00092                                 m_kernelArguments.push_back(kernelArg);
00093                                 m_serializationSizeInBytes+=sizeof(b3KernelArgData);
00094                         }
00095             
00096                         cl_int status = clSetKernelArg( m_kernel, m_idx++, sz, &consts );
00097                         b3Assert( status == CL_SUCCESS );
00098                 }
00099 
00100                 inline void launch1D( int numThreads, int localSize = 64)
00101                 {
00102                         launch2D( numThreads, 1, localSize, 1 );
00103                 }
00104 
00105                 inline void launch2D( int numThreadsX, int numThreadsY, int localSizeX, int localSizeY )
00106                 {
00107                         size_t gRange[3] = {1,1,1};
00108                         size_t lRange[3] = {1,1,1};
00109                         lRange[0] = localSizeX;
00110                         lRange[1] = localSizeY;
00111                         gRange[0] = b3Max((size_t)1, (numThreadsX/lRange[0])+(!(numThreadsX%lRange[0])?0:1));
00112                         gRange[0] *= lRange[0];
00113                         gRange[1] = b3Max((size_t)1, (numThreadsY/lRange[1])+(!(numThreadsY%lRange[1])?0:1));
00114                         gRange[1] *= lRange[1];
00115 
00116                         cl_int status = clEnqueueNDRangeKernel( m_commandQueue, 
00117                                 m_kernel, 2, NULL, gRange, lRange, 0,0,0 );
00118             if (status != CL_SUCCESS)
00119             {
00120                 printf("Error: OpenCL status = %d\n",status);
00121             }
00122                         b3Assert( status == CL_SUCCESS );
00123 
00124                 }
00125         
00126                 void    enableSerialization(bool serialize)
00127                 {
00128                         m_enableSerialization = serialize;
00129                 }
00130                 
00131 };
